city: Charlotte Amalie-Cyril E. King (ex Harry S. Truman)
circumstances: While approaching Charlotte Amalie Airport on a cargo flight from Christiansted, the aircraft went out of control and crashed into the sea few km offshore. SAR operations were initiated but eventually abandoned after few days as no trace of the aircraft nor the pilot was found.
probable_cause: Due to lack of evidences as the wreckage was not found, the exact cause of the accident could to be determined.
